channel.title: Bus simulator / European bus simulator probs
channel.description:
Hi.
If i use a steering wheel, it says if i wanna release the brakes:
Get the RPM to under 900.
How i do that? If i dont use a steering wheel etc, its all fine..

@zyle1992 wrote:

I’m going to go ahead and say if you’ve got a problem with a particular program or device, you should ask the people who developed it.
